member.name: M:InsuranceRight.Services.Acceptance.Controllers.AcceptanceController.Check(InsuranceRight.Services.Models.Car.ViewModels.CarViewModel)
member.param: Current data. Can include -1- Car details (licenseplate, price, security measurements, etc), -2- Most frequent driver details, -3- Risk assesment answers
member.returns: Acceptance status indicating accepted or not, and if not the reason
